mapper.select: SELECT user_sn AS userSn, user_name AS userName, email, password, gender, address, zip_code AS zipCode, telno FROM user WHERE user_sn = #{userSn}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET user_name = #{userName}, email = #{email}, password = #{password}, gender = #{gender}, address = #{address}, zip_code = #{zipCode}, telno = #{telno}, use_yn = 'Y' WHERE user_sn = #{userSn}
